about.paragraph1: Frontend Software Developer focused on building scalable and maintainable user-facing web applications.
about.paragraph2: I work with a strong emphasis on component-based architecture, code reusability, and clear separation of responsibilities.
about.paragraph3: With experience using React and TypeScript, and a background in Node.js and API-driven systems, I understand the full interaction between frontend and backend, allowing me to collaborate effectively within product and engineering teams.
about.subtitle: What I offer

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.text: A responsive e-commerce application built with React, featuring a product catalog, shopping cart, and user authentication. It integrates with a third-party API to dynamically fetch and display product data.

colorGenerator.title: Color Generator
colorGenerator.text: A color generator application built with React that allows users to create and save color palettes. It features a simple and user-friendly interface and integrates with a third-party API.

moreProjects.title: More Projects
moreProjects.text: A collection of React projects showcasing different features, functionalities, and implementation approaches.

contact.title: Let’s work together
contact.text: Whether you have a project in mind or just want to connect, I’d love to hear from you.
